website_summaries.verdict: A durable, all-steel construction staple gun that includes 1,875 staples and a staple remover.
pros: Arrow's heavy-duty staple gun is designed to work with 6 different sizes of T50 staples
The easy-squeeze handle is slip resistant and the magazine is jam resistant so there are fewer hang-ups while working
cons: The smaller staples tend to jam more easily and frequently than larger ones

customer_reviews.title: Been a while since using a staple gun...
customer_reviews.text: After figuring out how to install the staples (it's been a really long time since I've used a gun) it was super easy to use. The remover worked great as well.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to load and easy to squeeze trigger. Like most manual staplers, you do have to hold the tip down to get a the staples to seat well. I have not had any issues in the short time that I have been using this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works just like my dad's
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one project so far and it's the same as the one I remember borrowing from my dad 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Stapler jammed up about half the time it was used. Huge waste of energy...I could've hammered nails faster than clearing this thing
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good in home tool
customer_reviews.text: Works good around the house. My husband used it to hand Christmas lights outside
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Have to follow it up with a hammer
customer_reviews.text: The design of this stapler is such that you can't apply good pressure when stapling. There is no place to put your hand to apply said pressure. Thus, your projects will require you to follow up with a hammer to get the staples fully embedded in your base. My projects have all been into wood through rope and not one was able to make it through the rope and get well entrenched in the wood. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great that it comes with the variety of staples as well - good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great staple gun
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes with everything you need already. Its very sturdy and has weight to it. i look forward to using this on future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staples very well
customer_reviews.text: I got this staple gun to hang my Christmas lights. It worked really well but I had to use both hands to work it. Next staple gun needs to be corded I think. I’ll use this for household projects as needed. Good to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K

customer_reviews.title: Replacing carpeting on boat trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to replace carpeting on my boat trailer using 1/2 inch staples. It works perfectly with little effort. After reading a few of the reviews I thought that Arrow may of reduced their quality but was wrong. I suspect some of the reviews may of been due to a lack of experience with the user. You need to apply a little pressure which is always required when using a gun of this sort. No jamming and I couldn’t be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not as good as it used to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand and model of staple gun I grew up using but it is not the same quality ... or the staples are not. Gun jammed constantly with the smaller Arrow staples making my project more difficult. I wasted nearly 40 percent of the staples to jams or “misfires”.
customer_reviews.author: KFDB

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere - This is Junk
customer_reviews.text: Maybe at one time Arrow products were ok, but this thing is junk. I got it for my wife so she could staple canvas to soft wooden frames for artwork. Overall she stapled about 50 times before it broke. I think there were other reviewers that had the same issue, but I ignored them thinking that Arrow products were good. I was wrong. Don't you make the same mistake. This is poorly made junk.
customer_reviews.author: David Gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and seems to be very well made
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: Want to return it. Was not what I wanted. I don’t want to build a house. I just want to clip papers together. I can’t find your 800 number
customer_reviews.author: packerjean

customer_reviews.title: Problems with c-clip, as is normal.
customer_reviews.text: C-clip came off pin on the third staple. Same problem as most of the other Arrow staplers I have owned. Why doesn't Arrow fix this ancient design flaw?
customer_reviews.author: Dieseldog

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this same model for years and love it. It’s very sturdy and well made. We mostly use it at Christmas when putting up lights and such. But you surly will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: good product, does the job, is very sturdy,however it will work the heck out of your hands. Thumb specifically. you have to put a lot of power into pressing down on the liver. Other than that it works fine
customer_reviews.author: S Downer

customer_reviews.title: Good product needs case
customer_reviews.text: Great staple gun and staple kit but needs a hard storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Self

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This thing will not drive staples into poplar wood. All of the staples need a hammer finish. This thing is going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Staple puller works great! The staple gun is sturdy and having all the staples that come with it gives you plenty to get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one lasted about 1 1/2 years with everyday use. I use it to staple shipping labels to wooden crates.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander H

customer_reviews.title: Arrow Fastner set's the standard - Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Quality product made in America, set at a fair price. Highly recommend over any cheap Chinese knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: BFG

customer_reviews.title: Hammer time
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if we just werent pushing hard enough but the staples sometimes didnt want to fire all the way into the material. There were some times we had to hammer them down.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. It jammed up every time and I was unable to get any staples to go into anything.
customer_reviews.author: Scherrie Michel

customer_reviews.title: Arrow stapler
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product, be warned, it is a BIG heavy duty stapler. People with small hands will find it a challenge
customer_reviews.author: Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is just right for my carpentry needs. It is easy to load and easy to use. I recommend this stapler
customer_reviews.author: Earthsechoes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs, trigger is soft but hits hard. A 9/16" staple no problem and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Myanu

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap and jammed repeatedly starting with the third staple.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with this staple gun we use it day in day out dropping them on concrete this is the only stapler to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Garritt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Husband to re upholster a couple of chairs.. He's used it all over the house! Loves it
customer_reviews.author: wilkywoods

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Stanley stapler, but it broke immediately. The Arrow is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Xequez

customer_reviews.title: Great for stapling paper targets at the gun range!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for using at the gun range for stapling up targets.
customer_reviews.author: needed this

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: gets the job done. Harder to squeeze the handle compered to some of the brand name ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long life
customer_reviews.text: A replacement. The first one lasted 42 years of constant use
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The third time I tried to use it the staples won’t come out. Nothing jammed I looked.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and affordable. Comes with plenty of extra staples! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Dt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Small Dollar Amount
customer_reviews.text: I needed this stapler for an upholstery project for my dog. I have 4 pallets that I fashioned into 2 "couches" for him. I was able to complete my project with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: flynbye

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Tough to squeeze trigger but expected with spring action. Great product. Already ran through a few rows of different sized staples
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Would not work on wood or anything. Had one before (same make and model) and this one doesn't staple at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for home or office
customer_reviews.text: I truly enjoy this staple gun and the different size staples
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Handle is akward to use
customer_reviews.text: Handle should be made into the body of the staple gun!
customer_reviews.author: Les Kleckley

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: Jammed after a couple hours of using it. I had to take it apart to un jam it. Once I put it back together it jammed again soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Gallegos Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little larger than I expected, but love that I can use different size staples to meet my project needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to squeeze . But gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: update! it’s broken second time used. Garbage now, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: best stapler package
customer_reviews.text: Still the best stapler on the market. Used for reupholstering. The staple remover is the handiest tool in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Does not like short staples
customer_reviews.text: Does not like to shoot the short staples jams every shot
customer_reviews.author: Jpflash70

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and handle
customer_reviews.text: Received exact item as ordered. Heavy duty enough to use for upholstery repair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Came with everything I need. Staples gun. Staples and remover
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I Love this one! So easy to work with and i love the other stuff coming with the package.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Not penetrating all the way
customer_reviews.text: I used the stapler to replace the upholstery of a chair. Every staple I put in did not punch all the way. There was a 1/16 inch hanging and not going through even though the wood is not so hard. Is the stapler designed to do that or is this a factory defect? I don't know. I used a hammer to drive the staples all the way even though some of the staple bent upon impact.
customer_reviews.author: AMADO

product_meta.title: ARROW Staple Gun T50 Heavy Duty Kit with 1875 Staples and Remover
feature_bullets: Made in USA, all steel construction for strength, chrome finish for durability.This staple gun is ideal for home or professional use.
Easy squeeze mechanism for simple operation, jam-resistant ensure reliable performance. Grip handle resists slipping and adds more leverage.
Designed to work with 6 sizes of T50 staples for a wide variety of applications: 1/4’’, 5/16’’, 3/8’’, 1/2’’, 17/32’’ and 9/16’’.
SL24D staple remover features a strong ergonomic handle to gets the job done quickly.
This kit includes: staple gun, 1875 staples & staple remover.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars246 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
